name: Aparthotel Duva & Spa

reviews.text: I think this was one of the best holidays i'v been to, got back early this morning and was so sad to leave, the pool is fine, tiles are quite slippery though. Other than that everything was amazing, 10 minutes walk away from the beach/shops. Supermarket over the road. The food was nice in the hotel and the staff are really nice too! we went all inclusive and it was really helpfull. Matt&Jen(the entertainers), they was lovely. There is also games for the little ones in the daytime, (adults can join too) and the entertainment on a night was also great! i would advise anyone to go to this hotel, it was fab!!!
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our 3rd stay at the Duva but, while we will no doubt return to Puerto Pollensa, we may consider other hotels/apartments. The Duva has much to recommend it - the apartments are clean and spacious. Fresh towels provided every day bar Sunday, good sized bathroom, flat screen t.v in lounge (picks up BBC channels, ITV as well as a few foreign stations). Reception staff are friendly & helpful.
reviews.title: Great hotel ................but.....

reviews.text: We were self catering but had our evening meal at the hotel on several occasions. There was always plenty of choice and at 17euro's each pretty good value (this, by the way included soft drinks, beer, wine, coffee etc). The restuarant staff are pleasant and polite.
reviews.title: Excellent- had a wonderful holiday!

reviews.text: What really lets the Duva down is the pool area - this is far too small for the size of the complex. Sunbeds are so crammed in you cannot move between them and the beds themselves have seeen much better days. We spent an hour by the pool and had to leave as it was so uncomfortable. A few days in to our holiday we discovered the 'quiet' pool which is located across the road from the Fitness Centre. The pool is small with about a dozen sunbeds and three or four umbrellas however it was far from quiet with an abundance of children having a great time jumping in and out. It's lovely that children can enjoy theirselves but a 'quiet' pool should be - quiet !
reviews.title: It was OK but ............

reviews.text: The Duva has some nice garden areas but no beds or chairs available to spend a little time away from the noise and just relax. There is a pond by the gardens which was lovely when we stayed 3 years ago - you could see the fish and beautiful water lilies there however now it is stagnant with plastic bags floating round in it.
reviews.title: Certainly not 4 star, however a nice stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed during second week of September, found hotel quiet - not too much bother to get a sun bed (but we preferred the beach). We had room overlooking mountains & tennis courts (recommended - quiet, also got late afternoon sun). Room very clean, air con good. Staff helpful, excellent English.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay, would go again.

reviews.text: We enjoyed the 20 min walk to beach (clean beach, calm sea). We went B&B (good selection hot & cold breakfasts). Supermarket "opposite" expensive. Local Eroski supermarket (10 mins walk up main road towards town) sold cheap local beer/wine; own brand foods good, excellent choice of fresh fruit, veg, meat & fish.
reviews.title: Andy F

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a week in the Duva, the staff were very friendly and helpful, the apartment was clean and tidy and the hotel nice and quiet at night, no loud music or mopeds going past.
reviews.title: A great stay with friendly staff

reviews.text: The food was good and varied, lots of fish available as well as your usual fair. There was always plenty of loungers available at the pool no matter what time of day. The gym is excellent, well kitted out and never too busy.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.text: We booked the Duva a few months ago and then found out off a friend that he goes there at least 3 times a year, every year! We now know why!
reviews.title: Excellent!!!

reviews.text: Right from the start the hotel staff were really accommodating and after a quick email to them, they gave us a fantastic pool view room.
reviews.title: "Great holiday"

reviews.text: The food was outstanding and probably the best we have had in all the 4star all inclusive resorts we have stayed at.
reviews.title: Would go back here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entertainers, Jennie and Matt were fantastic and kept the children and adults entertained all week even though it was end of season.
reviews.title: Not 4 star

reviews.text: The rooms were lovely and roomy and you can seperate the lounge from the bedroom and bathroom for an extra bit of privacy. My only comment would be it would be beneficial if you could reach the balcony from the bedroom.
reviews.title: Great Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We rented a superior apartment that had lovely views over the Tramuntana hills - lovely to sit on the balcony and eat, drink and chat.
reviews.title: Nice Apartment, location not so good

reviews.text: The complex is clean and the reception are very helpful and polite. It is a good walk into Puerto Pollensa and the road is busy and dusty.
reviews.title: Going back next year!

reviews.text: Rooms are basic but clean with separate bedroom and bathroom and the added advantage of a kitchen. We were on the ground floor so had a patio and garden which was great.
reviews.title: Delightful Duva

reviews.text: Always good choice for food for adults and children.
reviews.title: Average at best

reviews.text: Pool area was nice, the pool is very deep though - cant stand up in it so need to be very careful if not a string swimmer or have kids.
reviews.title: Loved this Hotel

description: The Aparthotel Duva Convention & Spa Center is located in the town of Puerto Pollensa in Majorca. The sandy beach with shallow waters and clean sands is under a mile away from the Duva Pollensa Aparthotel. Puerto Pollensa, which has plenty of shops, boutiques, cafes, bars, restaurants and places for a great nightlife is only 850 metres from the complex. The Duva Aparthotel offers a chilled out atmosphere, which is ideal for those looking for a relaxing break from the hustle and bustle of home life. Cyclist 4 Star complex with security, repair, storage and bike cleaning facilities, washing machine & drier. Professional bike hiring. Cycling & routing backup services & Cycle excursions. Training camps 7 & 14 days. As a complement of our facilities services, we offer you the opportunity succeed in the organization of your own important events. 3 Multifunctional rooms endowed with the most advanced technology and in one of the best evironment of the north side of Majorca. Open from February till November, Come and Enjoy!!!
